# bskyr

`bskyr` provides an interface to the Bluesky Social API, allowing you to
interact with Bluesky Social from R. To do this, we provide functions
which match with the [AT Protocol’s
Lexicon](https://atproto.com/guides/lexicon), which is like using
regular HTTP requests. Outputs from `bskyr`’s functions are primarily
`tibble`s, allowing for easy analysis of the outputs from the API calls.

## Installation

You can install the stable version of `bskyr` from
[CRAN](https://cran.r-project.org/package=bskyr) with:

``` r
install.packages('bskyr')
```

You can install the development version of `bskyr` from
[GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages('pak')
pak::pak('christopherkenny/bskyr')
```

## Posting with `bskyr`

First, load the package:

``` r
library(bskyr)
```

Text posts can be made as follows:

``` r
bs_post(text = 'Your text goes here.')
```

If you have images to include, up to four can be included with the
`images` argument:

``` r
bs_post(
  text = 'Your text goes here.', 
  images = c('path/to/image1.jpg', 'path/to/image2.png')
)
```

Alt text can be added to images with the `images_alt` argument:

``` r
bs_post(
  text = 'Your text goes here.', 
  images = c('path/to/image1.jpg', 'path/to/image2.png'), 
  images_alt = c('Alt text for image 1', 'Alt text for image 2')
)
```

To quote or reply to a post, use the `quote` and/or `reply` argument,
respectively. These can take the link of an existing post. You can quote
and reply to the same post, if you want.

``` r
bs_post(
  text = 'Your text goes here.', 
  quote = 'https://bsky.app/profile/chriskenny.bsky.social/post/3kepscxiljc22',
  reply = 'https://bsky.app/profile/chriskenny.bsky.social/post/3kepscxiljc22'
)
```

See the reference for additional features, including likes with
[`bs_like()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_like.md)
and reposts with
[`bs_repost()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_repost.md).

## Authentication

To authenticate, you first need to make an App Password. To do this, go
to `https://bsky.app/settings`. Under “Advanced” click App passwords and
then “Add App Password.”

Once you have a password, you need to run:

``` r
set_bluesky_user('YOUR-USERNAME.bsky.social')
set_bluesky_pass('your-apps-pass-word')
```

If you want this to persist across sessions, set `install = TRUE` and
`r_env = file.path(Sys.getenv('HOME'), '.Renviron')`. This will save
your credentials in your R environment file.

Alternatively, you can set them manually using
`usethis::edit_r_environ()` and adding lines like so:

``` R
BLUESKY_APP_USER='YOUR-USERNAME.bsky.social'
BLUESKY_APP_PASS='your-apps-pass-word'
```

## 

# Package index

## Interact with posts

Create, edit, and delete records including posts, reposts, and likes

- [`bs_block()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_block.md)
  : Block an account
- [`bs_follow()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_follow.md)
  : Follow an account
- [`bs_like()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_like.md)
  : Like an existing post
- [`bs_new_list()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_new_list.md)
  : Create a list
- [`bs_new_list_item()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_new_list_item.md)
  : Add a subject to a list
- [`bs_new_starter_pack()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_new_starter_pack.md)
  : Create a new starter pack
- [`bs_post()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_post.md)
  : Make a post on Bluesky Social
- [`bs_repost()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_repost.md)
  : Repost an existing post

## Actor

Functions related to an actor (a user)

- [`bs_get_actor_suggestions()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_get_actor_suggestions.md)
  : Get a list of actors suggested for following
- [`bs_get_preferences()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_get_preferences.md)
  : Get (Self) Preferences
- [`bs_get_profile()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_get_profile.md)
  : Get Profile for a Bluesky Social User
- [`bs_search_actors()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_search_actors.md)
  : Find profiles matching search criteria

## Authentication

Functions for authenticating `bskyr` users

- [`bs_auth()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_auth.md)
  : Authenticate a user
- [`has_bluesky_pass()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/pass.md)
  [`get_bluesky_pass()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/pass.md)
  [`bs_get_pass()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/pass.md)
  [`bs_has_pass()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/pass.md)
  : Check or Get Bluesky App Password
- [`set_bluesky_pass()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/set_bluesky_pass.md)
  [`bs_set_pass()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/set_bluesky_pass.md)
  : Add Entry to Renviron
- [`set_bluesky_user()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/set_bluesky_user.md)
  [`bs_set_user()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/set_bluesky_user.md)
  : Adds Bluesky User to .Renviron.
- [`has_bluesky_user()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/user.md)
  [`get_bluesky_user()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/user.md)
  [`bs_get_user()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/user.md)
  [`bs_has_user()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/user.md)
  : Check or Get Bluesky User

## Feed

Functions which describe feeds (essentially timelines filled with posts)

- [`bs_get_author_feed()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_get_author_feed.md)
  : Retrieve posts on an actor's feed
- [`bs_get_feed()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_get_feed.md)
  : Build feed from user's feed generator
- [`bs_get_feed_generator()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_get_feed_generator.md)
  : Get specific information about one feed generator
- [`bs_get_feed_generators()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_get_feed_generators.md)
  : Get information about a list of feed generators
- [`bs_get_feed_suggestions()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_get_feed_suggestions.md)
  : Get a list of feed suggestions
- [`bs_get_feeds()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_get_feeds.md)
  : Retrieve a list of feeds created by a given actor
- [`bs_get_likes()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_get_likes.md)
  : Retrieve posts liked by an actor (self)
- [`bs_get_list_feed()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_get_list_feed.md)
  : Retrieve recent posts from actors in a list
- [`bs_get_post_likes()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_get_post_likes.md)
  : Retrieve likes on a post
- [`bs_get_post_thread()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_get_post_thread.md)
  : Retrieve thread of posts
- [`bs_get_posts()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_get_posts.md)
  : Retrieve thread of posts
- [`bs_get_quotes()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_get_quotes.md)
  : Retrieve a list of quotes for a given post
- [`bs_get_reposts()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_get_reposts.md)
  : Retrieve actors who reposted a post
- [`bs_get_timeline()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_get_timeline.md)
  : Retrieve the user's home timeline
- [`bs_search_posts()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_search_posts.md)
  : Find posts matching search criteria

## Graph

Functions which describe the relationships between users

- [`bs_get_actor_lists()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_get_actor_lists.md)
  : Get a list of lists that belong to an actor.
- [`bs_get_actor_starter_packs()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_get_actor_starter_packs.md)
  : Get starter packs created by an actor
- [`bs_get_blocked_lists()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_get_blocked_lists.md)
  : Retrieve a user's (self) muted lists
- [`bs_get_blocks()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_get_blocks.md)
  : Retrieve user (self) blocks
- [`bs_get_follow_suggestions()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_get_follow_suggestions.md)
  : Get suggested follows related to a given actor
- [`bs_get_followers()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_get_followers.md)
  : Retrieve an actor's followers
- [`bs_get_follows()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_get_follows.md)
  : Retrieve an actor's follows
- [`bs_get_list()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_get_list.md)
  : Get a view of a list
- [`bs_get_muted_lists()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_get_muted_lists.md)
  : Retrieve a user's (self) muted lists
- [`bs_get_mutes()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_get_mutes.md)
  : Retrieve a user's (self) muted accounts
- [`bs_get_relationships()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_get_relationships.md)
  : Get relationships between an account and other users
- [`bs_get_starter_pack()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_get_starter_pack.md)
  : Get information on one starter pack
- [`bs_get_starter_packs()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_get_starter_packs.md)
  : Get information about a list of starter packs

## Notifications

Interact with your own notifications

- [`bs_get_notification_count()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_get_notification_count.md)
  : Get the user's (self) number of unread notifications
- [`bs_get_notifications()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_get_notifications.md)
  : Get the user's (self) notifications

## Repo

Procedures for adding and otherwise interacting with records on Bluesky
Social

- [`bs_create_record()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_create_record.md)
  : Create a record in a repo
- [`bs_delete_block()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_delete_block.md)
  [`bs_unblock()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_delete_block.md)
  : Delete a block
- [`bs_delete_follow()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_delete_follow.md)
  [`bs_unfollow()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_delete_follow.md)
  : Delete a follow (un-follow someone)
- [`bs_delete_like()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_delete_like.md)
  [`bs_unlike()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_delete_like.md)
  : Delete a like (un-like something)
- [`bs_delete_list()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_delete_list.md)
  : Delete a list
- [`bs_delete_list_item()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_delete_list_item.md)
  : Delete a list item
- [`bs_delete_post()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_delete_post.md)
  : Delete a post
- [`bs_delete_record()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_delete_record.md)
  : Delete a record in a repo
- [`bs_delete_repost()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_delete_repost.md)
  : Delete a repost
- [`bs_delete_starter_pack()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_delete_starter_pack.md)
  : Delete a starter pack
- [`bs_describe_repo()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_describe_repo.md)
  : Describe a repo
- [`bs_get_record()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_get_record.md)
  : Get an arbitrary record from a repo
- [`bs_list_records()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_list_records.md)
  : List records in a repo
- [`bs_upload_blob()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_upload_blob.md)
  : Upload a blob to a repo

## Direct Messages

Send, receive, and delete direct messages (aka convos)

- [`bs_accept_convo()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_accept_convo.md)
  : Accept a conversation (direct message) invitation or request
- [`bs_add_reaction()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_add_reaction.md)
  : Add a reaction (e.g. emoji) to a message in a conversation
- [`bs_delete_message_for_self()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_delete_message_for_self.md)
  : Remove a message from your view of a conversation (does not delete
  it for others)
- [`bs_get_convo()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_get_convo.md)
  : Retrieve detailed information about a conversation by its ID
- [`bs_get_convo_availability()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_get_convo_availability.md)
  : Check conversation availability with specified members
- [`bs_get_convo_for_members()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_get_convo_for_members.md)
  : Retrieve conversation shared among specified members
- [`bs_get_convo_log()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_get_convo_log.md)
  : Retrieve the chat event log for the authenticated user
- [`bs_get_messages()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_get_messages.md)
  : Retrieve messages from a conversation, optionally paginated
- [`bs_leave_convo()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_leave_convo.md)
  : Exit a conversation so you no longer receive messages or see it in
  your inbox
- [`bs_list_convos()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_list_convos.md)
  : List the conversations (direct message threads) for the
  authenticated user
- [`bs_mute_convo()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_mute_convo.md)
  : Mute a conversation so you no longer receive notifications.
- [`bs_remove_reaction()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_remove_reaction.md)
  : Remove a previously added reaction from a message
- [`bs_send_message()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_send_message.md)
  : Send a message in a conversation (DM thread)
- [`bs_send_message_batch()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_send_message_batch.md)
  : Send multiple messages across different conversations
- [`bs_unmute_convo()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_unmute_convo.md)
  : Unmute a previously muted conversation
- [`bs_update_all_read()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_update_all_read.md)
  : Mark all conversations as read for the authenticated user
- [`bs_update_read()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_update_read.md)
  : Mark a conversation (optionally up to a specific message) as read

## Other

Other Functions

- [`bs_accept_convo()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_accept_convo.md)
  : Accept a conversation (direct message) invitation or request
- [`bs_add_reaction()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_add_reaction.md)
  : Add a reaction (e.g. emoji) to a message in a conversation
- [`bs_created_at()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_created_at.md)
  : Get current time in Bluesky format
- [`bs_delete_message_for_self()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_delete_message_for_self.md)
  : Remove a message from your view of a conversation (does not delete
  it for others)
- [`bs_extract_record_key()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_extract_record_key.md)
  : Extract Record Key from a link
- [`bs_get_convo()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_get_convo.md)
  : Retrieve detailed information about a conversation by its ID
- [`bs_get_convo_availability()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_get_convo_availability.md)
  : Check conversation availability with specified members
- [`bs_get_convo_for_members()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_get_convo_for_members.md)
  : Retrieve conversation shared among specified members
- [`bs_get_convo_log()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_get_convo_log.md)
  : Retrieve the chat event log for the authenticated user
- [`bs_get_messages()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_get_messages.md)
  : Retrieve messages from a conversation, optionally paginated
- [`bs_leave_convo()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_leave_convo.md)
  : Exit a conversation so you no longer receive messages or see it in
  your inbox
- [`bs_list_convos()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_list_convos.md)
  : List the conversations (direct message threads) for the
  authenticated user
- [`bs_mute_convo()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_mute_convo.md)
  : Mute a conversation so you no longer receive notifications.
- [`bs_new_embed_external()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_new_embed_external.md)
  : Embed external media in a post
- [`bs_remove_reaction()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_remove_reaction.md)
  : Remove a previously added reaction from a message
- [`bs_resolve_handle()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_resolve_handle.md)
  : Resolve a Handle to Decentralized Identifier (DID)
- [`bs_send_message()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_send_message.md)
  : Send a message in a conversation (DM thread)
- [`bs_send_message_batch()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_send_message_batch.md)
  : Send multiple messages across different conversations
- [`bs_unmute_convo()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_unmute_convo.md)
  : Unmute a previously muted conversation
- [`bs_update_all_read()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_update_all_read.md)
  : Mark all conversations as read for the authenticated user
- [`bs_update_read()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_update_read.md)
  : Mark a conversation (optionally up to a specific message) as read
- [`bs_uri_to_url()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_uri_to_url.md)
  : Convert Universal Resource Identifiers to Hypertext Transfer
  Protocol Secure URLs
- [`bs_url_to_uri()`](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/reference/bs_url_to_uri.md)
  : Convert Hypertext Transfer Protocol Secure URLs to Universal
  Resource Identifiers

  Social](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/articles/creating_records.md):

  Social](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/articles/gathering_data.md):

  Packs](http://christophertkenny.com/bskyr/articles/lists_and_starter_packs.md):
